A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Another epic Star Wars. Better than SW 7 for sure. Mark Hamill finally got the role he deserved as Skywalker. There were disappointments in the choices that the script writers made (\"that was lame\"\, \"no way he didn't know that\"\, etc) hence I remove half a point. But the movie had multiple very engaging sequences and plot twists. It was well worth the 3D dine-in theater ticket and the anticipation. :)
